Key Match Events: Nathan Eovaldi remained perfect with a win, pitching 6.1 innings, allowing 5 hits, 2 earned runs, 4 strikeouts, and 3 walks.
Yordan Alvarez hit a single in the first inning, scoring Jose Altuve.
Corey Seager was hit by a pitch in the ninth inning, scoring Josh Jung.
Adolis Garcia hit a home run in the second inning.
Jonathan Heim hit a home run in the fourth inning.
Darin Dubon hit a sacrifice fly in the sixth inning, scoring Yordan Alvarez.
Isiah Kiner-Falefa hit a home run in the ninth inning, scoring Eli White, Adolis Garcia, and Corey Seager.
Post-Match Reflections: The Astros fell to 0-2 in the series, with Game 7 scheduled for the next day.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Daikin Park in Houston, Texas.
Others: The game started at 3:07 PM local time.

The umpires for the game were Jordan Baker (home plate), Stu Scheurwater (first base), Mark Ripperger (second base), James Hoye (third base), Doug Eddings (left field), and Marvin Hudson (right field).
